bio.short: Passionate Full-Stack Engineer, obsessed with building powerful products. Between lines of code, I enjoy family time and good pizzas on Jerusalem rooftops.
bio.long:
I'm a full-stack software engineer who lives to build. For several years, I've been designing, developing, and scaling complete applications - from front to backend to infrastructure. Passionate about AI and automation, I integrate these technologies into all my projects to go faster, aim higher, and deliver better.

But life isn't just code: I value family, travel (between Paris and Jerusalem), and simple moments - a pizza on the roof with city views, a walk in the park, or a fun photo at the aquarium. This balance keeps me motivated and creative.

When I'm not coding, I'm still coding - it's simple: I'm launched and I don't stop.

mutuelles-v4.title: Mutuelles_v4 - Desktop Automation App
mutuelles-v4.description: Complete desktop application automating insurance platforms (mutuelles). Includes automated workflows, file management, intelligent scraping, and Playwright orchestration.

shoot.title: Shoot - Platform for Photographers
shoot.description: Complete ecosystem for professional photographers: powerful admin back-office, full-featured client dashboard, customizable showcase site. Robust architecture and clean UX.

ai-blog.title: AI Blog - AI Learning for Developers
ai-blog.description: Educational blog for developers: learn to master AI and boost your level with the right tools and best practices. Pedagogical, modern, and AI-oriented content.

portfolio-interactif.title: Interactive Portfolio with AI
portfolio-interactif.description: Innovative personal portfolio with AI-powered conversational interface, enabling intuitive navigation via natural commands. Interactive floating window system and dynamic themes.

phonegs.description: Complete development of a professional telephony application (VoIP), driven by React/Node, integrated with Asterisk and FusionPBX.
responsibilities: Full-stack development of internal application: React UI, Node.js API, PHP/Laravel backend
Advanced integration with telephony systems: Asterisk, FusionPBX, WebRTC
Implementation of dashboards and admin interfaces
Participation in product decisions with strong technical autonomy

freelance.description: Various missions in web development and automation for diverse clients.

webschool.description: Intensive training in web development covering frontend and backend.
achievements: Solid foundations in front and back development
